actions.Spellcasting: The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (save DC 14+1d4 + 12, +6+1d4 + 4 to hit with spell attacks):
actions.Shocking Grasp (Cantrip): Melee Spell Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.
